summary: Completed frontend testing of Brothers of the Highway Member Directory app. Modal z-index fix was incomplete - dropdown selections still blocked by modal overlay.

critical_bugs.issue: Modal backdrop (z-50) intercepts pointer events, blocking dropdown selections in forms
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot select Chapter, Title, or Role from dropdowns in Add Member and Add User modals
critical_bugs.technical_details: Dialog backdrop has z-50 and intercepts pointer events. Select component z-index was changed to z-[100] but modal backdrop still blocks interactions.
critical_bugs.error_message: intercepts pointer events

ui_bugs.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console

passed_tests: Navigation between Dashboard and User Management
Modal opening (Add Member and Add User modals open successfully)
Form field input (text fields work correctly)
Dropdown opening (dropdowns show options but selections are blocked)
success_percentage: Frontend: 70% (basic functionality works, but critical form submission blocked)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal backdrop z-index conflict. The Select component z-index fix (z-[100]) was correct but insufficient. Need to either: 1) Lower the Dialog backdrop z-index below z-[100], or 2) Increase Select dropdown z-index above z-50. The modal backdrop div with class 'fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/80' is intercepting all pointer events and preventing dropdown selections in both Member and User creation forms.
